name: Terra Puzzle 3D
description:
The objective of this game is to assemble a spherical jigsaw puzzle of the planet Earth at 3 levels of difficulty. The game is fully 3D and allows the player to freely float in the scene collecting puzzle elements and combining them together. Care has been taken to make the experience as close to that of assembling such a puzzle in real life as possible.

Key Features

  • a fully 3D experience
  • intuitive controls (mouse and keyboard)
  • 3 Levels of difficulty
  • 3 Levels of graphics detail
  • relaxing and challenging at the same time
  • adjustable sensitivity of controls
